title: It’s Okay as Long as It’s Fun!
detail_text: <:th_ch0210/>So, while I was in the middle of doing my homework, Nee-san suddenly barged into my room and said, “Let’s go to the museum right now!” you know?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Plus, the reason she wanted to go was, “Wouldn’t it be fun if the specimens and the dolls of the museum were to actually move at night?”. She probably got influenced by the movie we saw the other day....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Ahaha, Kaoruko-san really is an interesting person, huh.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>That’s what everyone says, but from my perspective, she’s just problematic....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>So, did you go to the museum after all?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Yeah, we went there. There’s this full-body skeletal remains of a dinosaur. I was surprised because it was much bigger than I expected.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Then it must’ve been fun, right.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Eh!? That’s.... well.... I suppose so.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Fufu, hearing your story makes me want to go out with Onee-chan too, Shioriko-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Ruby also wants to go to the museum with Onee-chan. Maybe Ruby will go ask Onee-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
